title: Pumpkin and ham satay
ingredients: ['75g peeled, cubed pumpkin', '175ml orange juice', '25g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 Thai chilli, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground coriander seeds', '200g cooked, diced ham', '170g crunchy peanut butter']
